pkgmetadata.longdescription: The ROHC library is an opensource and efficient library that implements the RObust Header Compression (ROHC) protocol as defined by the IETF in RFC 3095. The ROHC protocol is a highly robust and efficient header compression scheme for RTP/UDP/IP, UDP/IP, UDP-Lite/IP, ESP/IP and IP-only streams. Both IPv4 and IPv6 headers are supported.

La bibliothèque ROHC est une implémentation libre et efficace du protocole RObust Header Compression (ROHC) défini par l'IETF dans la RFC 3095. Le protocole ROHC est un algorithme extrêmement robuste et efficace de compression d'entêtes pour les flux RTP/UDP/IP, UDP/IP, UDP-Lite/IP, ESP/IP et IP seuls. Les entêtes IPv4 and IPv6 sont toutes les deux supportées.

use.flag: Enable extra traces in the ROHC library with potential impacts on performances. Use with care.
Install man pages and HTML documentation of the ROHC library API. It requires app-doc/doxygen with USE="dot".
Build and run library tests. It requires net-libs/libpcap.
Run library tests within Valgrind. It requires dev-util/valgrind.
